name: Rock Paper Random
description:
10 hour project for GMTK GameJam #GMTK2020
Theme: "Out of Control".

Took a break from a larger project just to release a game in a very short timespan and learn a new tool. I did create a small ruleset system which would change the game on each victory but just ran out of time for implementing any meaningful changes beyond making the enemy shake in anger xD 

Still figuring out WebGL scaling so will have to be played in fullscreen

First actual released project in a decade so I'm happy with this small game.


The Rock/Paper/Scissors sprite emotes are from https://pipoya.itch.io/free-popup-emotes-pack
